text: 13:27 Luk 23:34; 24:20; 24:44; Jon 16:3; Aposel 3:17; 15:21; 1 Korin 2:8Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba ko gumazir ekiaba, me kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ, Iesus en Akurvazir Gumazim. Egha me zurara Sabatɨn dughiamɨn Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimɨn akaba dɨbora, egha deragha dagh fozir puvatɨ. Egha ghaze gumazir kam aremegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimɨn akaba guizbangɨra otos.
